name: 6464 Binary Lane
description:
Move your mouse from green to blue in this fast paced game that demands intense focus to prevent going out of bounds and having to restart.

http://play.morphinegames.com/binary-lane/

6464 Binary Lane is a face paced game that requires only a mouse and the patience of a snake. It starts easy but ramps up fast and will have you throwing your mouse at the screen. 

Morphine will not be held responsible for damages to displays, wrists, or your mouse!!

6464 Binary Lane is an entry to the LOWREZJAM and was created in the 64x64 pixel space and then upscaled to 640x640px

For example, here are a couple of the actual mazes - mazes are just PNG files that were edited in photoshop
